isis.stitle: HOOD, GRILLE, FENDERS, BUMPER AND RUNNING BOARDS - MXT - REMOVE AND INSTALL - Pick Up Box

svcprocinfo.para: The pick up box is mounted to the rear frame behind the crew cab.

svcsubproc.title: Pick Up Box - Removal

step1.para: Disconnect electrical connector (Item 1, Figure 44) from taillight wiring harness connector (Item 2, Figure 44).

svcsubproc.para: Reference Figure 45 for items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove two screws and access plate (Item 3) from fuel fill hose protective cover (Item 4)
Remove the four screws that attach the fuel fill hose (Item 5) to the protective cover (Item 4). Move the fill hose down below the level of the protective cover.
Remove nut, two rubber box mounts, and bolt (Item 1) securing the forward portion of the pick up box (Item 2) to the frame (Item 7).
Remove three bolts and six rubber box mounts (Item 6) securing the middle and rear of the pick up box (Item 2) to the frame (Item 7).

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. FORWARD BOLT, RUBBER BOX MOUNTS AND NUT
6. REAR BOLTS, RUBBER BOX MOUNTS AND NUTS

step1.para: Repeat steps 4-5 on opposite side of frame.

Using a lifting device lift the pick up box (Item 2) up off the frame (Item 7) only enough to separate frame and box. Adjust the fuel fill hose neck (Item 5) down towards the driver side and move the pick up box towards the driver side enough so the fuel fill hose (Item 5) will clear the hole on the side of the box. When the pick up box is clear of the fuel fill hose, the pick up box may be lifted clear.
Place the pick up box on a padded surface to prevent damage to the painted surfaces of the box.

svcsubproc.title: Pick Up Box - Installation
svcsubproc.para: Reference Figure 45 for items in parentheses.

step1.para: Install the pick up box (Item 2) onto the frame (Item 7) ensuring that the fuel fill hose (item 5) from the fuel tank fits through the hole on the side of the box (Item 2).
Install the three bolts and six rubber box mounts (Item 6) securing the middle and rear of the pick up box (Item 2) to the frame (Item 7).
Install nut, two rubber box mounts, and bolt (Item 1) securing the forward portion of the pick up box (Item 2) to the frame (Item 7).
Repeat steps 2-3 for the opposite side of the pick up box (Item 2).
Install the four screws that attach the fuel fill hose (Item 5) to the protective cover (Item 4).
Install two screws and access plate (Item 3) from the fuel fill hose protective cover (Item 4).
Connect electrical connector (Item 1, Figure 44) to Taillight wiring harness connector (Item 2, Figure 44).
